 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָפַשׁ‎</span>] **verb denominative** (compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***refresh***; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be refreshed***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִנָּפֵשׁ‎</span> [[Exod.23.12|Exod 23:12]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[2Sam.16.14|2Sam 16:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּנָּפַ֑שׁ‎</span> [[Exod.31.17|Exod 31:17]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); — ***take breath, refresh oneself.***
